data.quote: We must go beyond textbooks, go out into the bypaths and untrodden depths of the wilderness and travel and explore and tell the world the glories of our journey.
data.author: John Hope Franklin

data.quote: Rome is the city of echoes, the city of illusions, and the city of yearning.
data.author: Giotto di Bondone

data.quote: If one had but a single glance to give the world, one should gaze on Istanbul.
data.author: Alphonse de Lamartine

data.quote: I would travel only by horse, if I had the choice.
data.author: Linda McCartney

data.quote: To travel is to discover that everyone is wrong about other countries.
data.author: Aldous Huxley

data.quote: Travelling expands the mind rarely.
data.author: Hans Christian Andersen

data.quote: The world is getting more connected through technology and travel. Cuisines are evolving. Some people are scared of globalization, but I think people will always take pride in cultural heritage.
data.author: John Mackey

data.quote: I travel around the world, and there are so many beautiful girls, but that's not going to make you a supermodel. You have to have something more than just a pretty face.
data.author: Irina Shayk

data.quote: If all difficulties were known at the outset of a long journey, most of us would never start out at all.
data.author: Dan Rather

data.quote: Ah! Young people, travel if you can, and if you cannot - travel all the same!
data.author: Jules Verne

data.quote: One travels more usefully when alone, because he reflects more.
data.author: Thomas Jefferson

data.quote: I've just concluded - since President Obama endorses the same-sex marriage, advocates homosexual people, and enjoys an attractive countenance - thus if it becomes necessary, I shall travel to Washington, D.C., get down on my knee, and ask his hand.
data.author: Robert Mugabe

data.quote: The travel and tourism industry, it's just a huge part of our economy.
data.author: Karen Hughes

data.quote: To the lover of wilderness, Alaska is one of the most wonderful countries in the world.
data.author: John Muir

data.quote: One of my passions is photography. I always carry a camera in my bag whenever I travel. I always take pictures wherever I go, and some of them end up being really crazy ones.
data.author: Sunidhi Chauhan

data.quote: The person attempting to travel two roads at once will get nowhere.
data.author: Xun Kuang

data.quote: The world is getting so small. Young people are mobile; they want to travel around the world. When you travel around the world, you exchange culture, you want to make friends, you want to exchange things.
data.author: Jack Ma

data.quote: Travel teaches as much as books.
data.author: Youssou N'Dour

data.quote: Even if you can't afford to travel the world, you can take your children to the museum, zoo or local park. And don't be afraid to take them to grown-up spots. Eating out in a restaurant teaches children how to be quiet and polite and gives them the pleasure of knowing you trust them to behave.
data.author: Kimora Lee Simmons

data.quote: If you wish to travel far and fast, travel light. Take off all your envies, jealousies, unforgiveness, selfishness and fears.
data.author: Cesare Pavese

data.quote: Venice is like eating an entire box of chocolate liqueurs in one go.
data.author: Truman Capote

data.quote: The land created me. I'm wild and lonesome. Even as I travel the cities, I'm more at home in the vacant lots.
data.author: Bob Dylan

data.quote: I love to travel, but hate to arrive.
data.author: Hernan Cortes

data.quote: A good story can travel in time and borders it hits you no matter where you are.
data.author: Hakan Nesser

data.quote: Think Indonesia and tourism, and the first thing that comes to mind is probably Bali. Think golf holiday, and most people would dream of Scotland or Ireland. But Indonesia harbors one of the best-kept secrets in the world of travel: it is a golfer's paradise.
data.author: Raymond Bonner

data.quote: And, obviously as a, as one who likes to travel around myself a lot, I think the Earth is a beautiful place. And, I'm looking forward to some new perspectives.
data.author: Duane G. Carey

data.quote: Time travel is such a magic concept.
data.author: Matt Smith

data.quote: The world reveals itself to those who travel on foot.
data.author: Werner Herzog

data.quote: The secret to modern life is finding the measure in time management. I have two kids, career and I travel, and I don't think my life is any different than most couples. The most valuable commodity now for many people is time and how to parcel that out.
data.author: Hugh Jackman

data.quote: Taking time to sit back and watch and think about what you've seen is important. Traveling did a great deal to me. I found that when I travel and just sit in the corner and watch, a million ideas come to me.
data.author: Lionel Richie

data.quote: I love to photograph the gorgeous landscapes when I travel.
data.author: Blake Lively

data.quote: The first condition of understanding a foreign country is to smell it.
data.author: Rudyard Kipling

data.quote: People don't understand that where I come from, everyone is either a convict, been in jail, been in a gang, is a hooligan of some sorts, but those are my brothers, my family and the people that I travel with. Those are the people that I roll with.
data.author: Lupe Fiasco

data.quote: I have no problem with the adventure travel movement. It makes better, more sensitive people. If you get people diving on a coral reef, they're going to become more respectful of the outdoors and more concerned with the threats that places like that face and they're going to care more about protecting them than they would have before.
data.author: Tim Cahill

data.quote: The everyday kindness of the back roads more than makes up for the acts of greed in the headlines.
data.author: Charles Kuralt

data.quote: Certainly, travel is more than the seeing of sights; it is a change that goes on, deep and permanent, in the ideas of living.
data.author: Mary Ritter Beard

data.quote: Travel is a lot like love.
data.author: Alain de Botton

data.quote: Let me be a free man - free to travel, free to stop, free to work.
data.author: Chief Joseph

data.quote: I love the simplicity, the ingredients, the culture, the history and the seasonality of Italian cuisine. In Italy people do not travel. They cook the way grandma did, using fresh ingredients and what is available in season.
data.author: Anne Burrell

data.quote: No one realizes how beautiful it is to travel until he comes home and rests his head on his old, familiar pillow.
data.author: Lin Yutang

data.quote: I love single life! Why would it be boring? I mean, I get to travel around and have loads of girls screaming at me, so it's definitely not boring. However, it can get lonely on the road, but I'm sorted I've got good people around me.
data.author: Olly Murs

data.quote: When I travel, I feel more like a nomad than a tourist.
data.author: Mohsin Hamid

data.quote: As I get older, the things that I want are starting to make more sense. Being able to travel makes me happy, and I am a person that lives in the moment. I also want to live a good life. Traveling makes everyday issues seem so much smaller and really changes my perspective on things.
data.author: Jacqueline MacInnes Wood

data.quote: No one can travel your own road for you you must travel it for yourself. My faith in this stems from my childhood. I grew up in a family with a system of religious beliefs handed down to me.
data.author: Amy Tan

data.quote: Songs really are like a form of time travel because they really have moved forward in a bubble. Everyone who's connected with it, the studio's gone, the musicians are gone, and the only thing that's left is this recording which was only about a three-minute period maybe 70 years ago.
data.author: Tom Waits

data.quote: During their service, men and women in our Armed Forces live by a common creed, promising never to leave a soldier behind. We should live by the same principle. When our veterans are asked to travel hundreds of miles for care that's offered right next door, we simply aren't living up to that standard, and something has to change.
data.author: John Delaney

data.quote: I am sort of an adventurer. I like to explore new places. I don't get to travel as often as I would like but I love it.
data.author: Edi Gathegi

data.quote: How often I found where I should be going only by setting out for somewhere else.
data.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

data.quote: People commonly travel the world over to see rivers and mountains, new stars, garish birds, freak fish, grotesque breeds of human; they fall into an animal stupor that gapes at existence and they think they have seen something.
data.author: Soren Kierkegaard

data.quote: When I'm home, I spend Sunday with my husband. If we're not cooking, we travel around in our camper, stop at fast-food restaurants, and picnic. We love that stuff that will harden your arteries in a hurry.
data.author: Dolly Parton

data.quote: We would go back and maybe not say that thing to our dad that we said, or maybe be a little nicer to someone who we cared about and had a relationship with when we were young. You know, they're subtle things, but we carry those with us forever. And I think that regret and time travel are intrinsically linked to me.
data.author: Colin Trevorrow

data.quote: I have wandered all my life, and I have also traveled; the difference between the two being this, that we wander for distraction, but we travel for fulfillment.
data.author: Hilaire Belloc

data.quote: I would wear the blue overalls of the fieldworker and often wore round, rimless glasses known as Mazzawati teaglasses. I had a car, and I wore a chauffeur's cap with my overalls. The pose of chauffeur was convenient because I could travel under the pretext of driving my master's car.
data.author: Nelson Mandela

data.quote: I want my handbags and my shoes to be stylish but I want to make sure that they're versatile. I travel and I have to make sure the pieces I put into my bag can go with a dress or with shorts or jeans.
data.author: Maria Sharapova

data.quote: I find the whole time travel question very unsettling if you take it to its logical extension. I think it might eventually be possible, but then what happens?
data.author: William Shatner

data.quote: I am living out my adolescent dream of travel and adventure.
data.author: Tim Cahill

data.quote: I travel in so many different ways; I travel high, I rough it... it all depends on who I travel with.
data.author: Diane von Furstenberg

data.quote: I want to travel. Maybe I'll end up living in Norway, making cakes.
data.author: Eva Green

data.quote: I enjoy the preparatory elements of travel - packing my bags and choosing my outfits - but my favourite part is getting there.
data.author: Dominic Monaghan

data.quote: I travel so much on stories, so I don't take vacation much, but one place I go back to again and again is my ranch.
data.author: Bill Kurtis

data.quote: I get very homesick, but otherwise it's a great privilege to get to travel for work.
data.author: Jesse Eisenberg

data.quote: The way that people feel changes everything. Feelings are forces. They cause us to time travel. And to leave ourselves, to leave our bodies. I would be that kind of psychologist who says, 'You're absolutely right - there are monsters under the bed.'
data.author: Helen Oyeyemi

data.quote: To be a Christian who is willing to travel with Christ on his downward road requires being willing to detach oneself constantly from any need to be relevant, and to trust ever more deeply the Word of God.
data.author: Henri Nouwen

data.quote: Know how to travel from your town to a nearby town without a car, either by bus or by rail.
data.author: Marilyn vos Savant

data.quote: In Italy, they add work and life on to food and wine.
data.author: Robin Leach

data.quote: In our town, Halloween was terrifying and thrilling, and there was a whiff of homicide. We'd travel by foot in the dark for miles, collecting candy, watching out for adults who seemed too eager to give us treats.
data.author: Rosecrans Baldwin

data.quote: The traveller has reached the end of the journey!
data.author: Edmund Burke

data.quote: Tourists don't know where they've been, travelers don't know where they're going.
data.author: Paul Theroux

data.quote: He travels the fastest who travels alone.
data.author: Rudyard Kipling

data.quote: You get educated by traveling.
data.author: Solange Knowles

data.quote: I wanted to travel from the beginning. As a kid, I used to dream about airplanes, before I ever flew in one.
data.author: Mary Ellen Mark

data.quote: Everywhere is nowhere. When a person spends all his time in foreign travel, he ends by having many acquaintances, but no friends.
data.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

data.quote: To travel hopefully is a better thing than to arrive.
data.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

data.quote: The bottom line is that time travel is allowed by the laws of physics.
data.author: Brian Greene

data.quote: Many years ago, large packs of wolves roamed the countryside in Ukraine, making travel in that part of the world very dangerous. These wolf packs were fearless. They were not intimidated by people nor by any of the weapons available at that time. The only thing that seemed to frighten them was fire.
data.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

data.quote: In all my wild mountaineering, I have enjoyed only one avalanche ride; and the start was so sudden, and the end came so soon, I thought but little of the danger that goes with this sort of travel, though one thinks fast at such times.
data.author: John Muir

data.quote: Travel works best when you're forced to come to terms with the place you're in.
data.author: Paul Theroux

data.quote: There's no such thing as a specific authenticity to what Mexico is, because Mexico is incredibly complex and varied, and the food is completely different if you travel 50 kilometers. It just changes all the time.
data.author: Gael Garcia Bernal

data.quote: Travel, which was once either a necessity or an adventure, has become very largely a commodity, and from all sides we are persuaded into thinking that it is a social requirement, too.
data.author: Jan Morris

data.quote: Spontaneity is what travel is all about.
data.author: Zach Anner

data.quote: Some people are drawn naturally - there are natural guitarists, and there are natural piano players, and I think guitar implies travel, a sort of footloose gypsy existence. You grab your bag and you go to the next town.
data.author: Hugh Laurie

data.quote: You do not travel if you are afraid of the unknown, you travel for the unknown, that reveals you with yourself.
data.author: Ella Maillart

data.quote: If you're successful, it's important to enjoy it! I love shopping for clothes, branded clothes. I love shopping in England, Dubai. I like to travel whenever I can.
data.author: Suresh Raina

data.quote: The most useful form of time travel would be to go back a year or two and rectify the mistakes we made.
data.author: Matt Lucas

data.quote: I love coming home to Melbourne. The first thing I do is have a coffee. It's just so much better here than anywhere else. It's better than in Italy and I travel a lot. I crave it.
data.author: Curtis Stone

data.quote: For many years, it seemed as if nothing changed in Norway. You could leave the country for three months, travel the world, through coups d'etat, assassinations, famines, massacres and tsunamis, and come home to find that the only new thing in the newspapers was the crossword puzzle.
data.author: Jo Nesbo

data.quote: Working is actually a pleasure. It's just very time-consuming. It's a way of life. I find that I can work when I travel and work when I run. There is nothing like, on a rainy day, to work.
data.author: Helmut Jahn

data.quote: Fitness is very important to me because it helps give me a routine when I travel. It gives me one hour of 'me' time and passes the time when I'm lonely. Living with scoliosis serves as a constant reminder to keep my core and back strong. If I get lazy, I feel it in my back first.
data.author: Martha Hunt

data.quote: Immortality may be impossible, but imagine what humanity could learn if we all lived 700 years. We could travel deep into utopia and beyond.
data.author: Gray Scott

data.quote: I travel a lot I hate having my life disrupted by routine.
data.author: Caskie Stinnett

data.quote: It is for us to pray not for tasks equal to our powers, but for powers equal to our tasks, to go forward with a great desire forever beating at the door of our hearts as we travel toward our distant goal.
data.author: Helen Keller

data.quote: I get a friend to travel with me... I need somebody to bring me back to who I am. It's hard to be alone.
data.author: Leonardo DiCaprio

data.quote: It always rains on tents. Rainstorms will travel thousands of miles, against prevailing winds for the opportunity to rain on a tent.
data.author: Dave Barry

data.quote: Hurt leads to bitterness, bitterness to anger, travel too far that road and the way is lost.
data.author: Terry Brooks

data.quote: If you have enthusiasm, you have a very dynamic, effective companion to travel with you on the road to Somewhere.
data.author: Loretta Young

data.quote: If somebody asked me about my inspiration I would say that it's not the peopleand it's not the things, it's travel and experiencing different environments.
data.author: Marc Newson

data.quote: Travel teaches toleration.
data.author: Benjamin Disraeli

data.quote: I don't have any superstitions, but what I always travel with is my pillow and my coffee.
data.author: Natalie Coughlin

data.quote: What I like in this job is you can travel to many places, many imaginations.
data.author: Marion Cotillard

data.quote: I don't feel restless, I just like to travel.
data.author: Brad Pitt

data.quote: Technologies that may be realized in centuries or millennium include: warp drive, traveling faster than the speed of light, parallel universes; are there other parallel dimensions and parallel realities? Time travel that we mentioned and going to the stars.
data.author: Michio Kaku

data.quote: One of the great things about music is that it has the capability of time travel - you smell a certain smell in the room and it takes you back to your childhood. I feel like music is able to do that, and it happens to me all the time.
data.author: M. Ward

data.quote: One of the few luxuries left is travel. And the aspect of travel that is luxurious is not the movement, but the being there.
data.author: Andre Balazs

data.quote: All the privileged can travel, see different worlds; not everyone can. I think it is important for people to have an interesting locale nearby.
data.author: Zaha Hadid

data.quote: I do often fly first class, but I don't travel with a posse, or bodyguard, or an assistant.
data.author: Gene Simmons

data.quote: I think that one of the main privileges of what I do, which I am just starting to learn, is to have the ability to travel all over the world and experience different cultures.
data.author: Chris Cornell

data.quote: I grew up in an era of thinking of travel as escape. The idea that you could conceivably have a new life, go somewhere, fall in love, have little children under the palm trees.
data.author: Paul Theroux

data.quote: What draws me in is that a trip is a leap in the dark. It's like a metaphor for life. You set off from home, and in the classic travel book, you go to an unknown place. You discover a different world, and you discover yourself.
data.author: Paul Theroux

data.quote: The two impulses in travel are to get away from home, and the other is to pursue something - a landscape, people, an exotic place. Certainly finding a place that you like or discovering something unusual is a very sustaining thing in travel.
data.author: Paul Theroux

data.quote: I travel a lot, and I hunt for fabrics, then I have the tailor make me something.
data.author: Waris Ahluwalia

data.quote: Touring is great because I love to travel.
data.author: Colin Donnell

data.quote: You can learn from everyone, the president or the cleaner. You need teachers in life, but they're not always school teachers or professors. You learn from ordinary people. You learn from travel, from just walking down the street.
data.author: Lapo Elkann

data.quote: I'll bring my grits when I travel, because I get so hungry on the road.
data.author: Dolly Parton

data.quote: I travel with a bunch of battery packs because I don't always have time to charge my phone at the hotel room when I'm traveling. I always change them, so I never run out of battery.
data.author: Avicii

data.quote: The human voice: mysterious, spontaneous, primal. For me, the human voice is the vessel on which all emotions travel - except perhaps jealousy. And the breath, the breath is the captain of that vessel.
data.author: Claron McFadden

data.quote: People travel north from Barcelona, not south.
data.author: Jose Andres

data.quote: When I was a kid, dressing right and looking good was a priority. As I grew up, I just wanted to stay that way, stick out a bit and have my own thing. That's where white belts and wearing some colors started. So signing with Puma was a great fit for me. I usually travel with nine pairs of golf shoes and 10 belts.
data.author: Rickie Fowler

data.quote: I try to lead a pretty active lifestyle. My biggest hobby is traveling with my family. I love to travel to new places and try crazy things. I'm a bit of a daredevil, so I have done things like zip lining, parasailing, scuba diving, and reverse bungee jumping!
data.author: Caroline Sunshine

data.quote: Time travel offends our sense of cause and effect - but maybe the universe doesn't insist on cause and effect.
data.author: Edward M. Lerner

data.quote: I had time with my mother, but I really lived with my father. One time he gave all his salary so I could travel to a training camp. He couldn't pay the rent, but he did that.
data.author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

data.quote: I'm not proud of it, but I'm a great liar when I travel. I smile and lie, and things are smooth.
data.author: Paolo Bacigalupi

data.quote: We need to protect our wilderness areas and national parks. Everywhere you travel, you see blight, denuded mountains, logging. If people know what's going on, they'll become activists to safeguard those places.
data.author: Christie Brinkley

data.quote: Radicals must be resilient, adaptable to shifting political circumstances, and sensitive enough to the process of action and reaction to avoid being trapped by their own tactics and forced to travel a road not of their choosing. In short, radicals must have a degree of control over the flow of events.
data.author: Saul Alinsky

data.quote: You learn so much about yourself as an artist. I never would have thought that I could sing every night, you know? Travel and perform every single night, and travel to another city the next day and do it all over again? You learn a lot of new things about yourself, and you make a lot of connections with people.
data.author: Yuna

data.quote: No matter where I travel, I make sure to carry a Vaseline body lotion with me to keep my skin well moisturised all the time.
data.author: Nargis Fakhri

data.quote: When I was drafted to Smackdown, I was like, 'Hell yes, I'm going to captain this ship.' Then I was like, 'Oh, wait, you're losing your best friend and travel partner and the person you enjoy having matches with the absolute most.' That's Charlotte. We travel together, and she is my best friend.
data.author: Becky Lynch

data.quote: I love listening to music on holiday, and back in the old days, I used to travel with cassette tapes and a boombox.
data.author: Art Malik

data.quote: Your lost friends are not dead, but gone before, advanced a stage or two upon that road which you must travel in the steps they trod.
data.author: Aristophanes

data.quote: The world has become more complex as technology and easy travel mixes cultures without homogenizing them.
data.author: Norman Spinrad

data.quote: We travel to learn; and I have never been in any country where they did not do something better than we do it, think some thoughts better than we think, catch some inspiration from heights above our own.
data.author: Maria Mitchell

data.quote: The social issues outside of football are not as defined as they were earlier, when integration took place and certain rights were legislated. The Civil Rights movement is over. Individuals can buy homes wherever they want, travel first class wherever they want, eat wherever they want.
data.author: Jim Brown

data.quote: Travel is so important in its capacity to expand the mind. It's exciting to start as young as possible - you get to see how other cultures live, challenge your senses, and try different cuisines.
data.author: Natalie Dormer

data.quote: Connecting with people, getting things done - that's what makes the travel worthwhile.
data.author: Tim Finchem

data.quote: Yeah, yeah, yeah, time travel's a nightmare. Don't go down that path.
data.author: Domhnall Gleeson

data.quote: I think young people should travel and travel often to other countries... like I do.
data.author: Henry Rollins

data.quote: If you have a fear of flying, don't. The data are very clear: If you have to travel someplace, the safest way is by airplane.
data.author: Peter Diamandis

data.quote: We've gotta reinvest in space travel. We should've never left the moon.
data.author: Ray Bradbury

data.quote: Travel is one of the best anti-war weapons that there are. I've been to Iran, and if you're there you see little kids, cops, old people, cemeteries. Once you see that, you can't say, 'Oh, Iran, let's bomb them.'
data.author: Viggo Mortensen

data.quote: I need to travel, of course, with my laptop, so I can do my business on the road.
data.author: Theophilus London

data.quote: Acting helped me as I was growing up. It helped me learn about myself, helped me travel, helped me understand life, express myself, all those wonderful things. So I'm very, very grateful; it's a fun job. It's a luxury.
data.author: Angelina Jolie

data.quote: If you travel to Germany, it's still absolutely Germany. If you travel to Sweden, it still has a Swedish identity.
data.author: Morrissey

data.quote: I travel regularly and have learnt to be very methodical as far as packing is concerned. For example, I always check the weather in advance of where I'm going to ensure that I've packed the right clothes.
data.author: Paloma Faith

data.quote: I always tell people, 'The music's free. I get paid to travel.'
data.author: Chris Stapleton

data.quote: It doesn't matter if you're a man or a woman - stay alert and focused on your surroundings. Travel with friends. Know where you are at all times, and never let your guard down.
data.author: Kimberly Guilfoyle

data.quote: The thing about Hemingway that people forget is that all the stuff he did was at a time where people weren't traveling that much. At 19 he travels to Italy. He goes to the Spanish Civil War. He goes to China, he goes to Africa so at that time to travel that much is really incredible.
data.author: Clive Owen

data.quote: I think the most romantic thing you can do is just turn up. Turn up when it's difficult for you. Travel halfway around the world or just up the road. Whatever it is, just be there.
data.author: James McAvoy

data.quote: I don't really desire things. I prefer to spend my money on experiences, on meals or travel.
data.author: Rachel McAdams

data.quote: When I think, where did I laugh the most, where did I eat the most, where did I just feel good all the time, I would say making the Bond movie 'Die Another Day.' To be part of such an iconic franchise and to travel to exotic places - that was the most fun I ever had.
data.author: Halle Berry

data.quote: We didn't travel much when I was little - most of what we did was visit various campsites around Conway, north Wales. My first major holiday abroad was to Ibiza with my parents when I was five. I vividly remember the plane touching down and that the hotel had great swings with lots of little lizards darting about that I was determined to catch.
data.author: Paul Hollywood

data.quote: It's been a huge blessing, being able to travel and have a great life.
data.author: Seann William Scott

data.quote: We travel so much, I never adjust to time zones any more.
data.author: Jillian Hervey

data.quote: I'd love to travel to the Holy Land.
data.author: Loretta Lynn

data.quote: If I have to travel, I'm going to travel my way and travel in the real world. And I'm going to have conversations every day with people in rest stops and people in gas stations and people in hotels and diners. That nourishes me.
data.author: Neil Peart

data.quote: I grew up in South Africa and I would look at maps and we were at the bottom of the world. There was this whole thing up there. I was always reading encyclopedias about the world. So travel was something I was always attracted to.
data.author: Charlize Theron

data.quote: There comes a moment on a journey when something sweet, something irresistible and charming as wine raised to thirsty lips, wells up in the traveller's being.
data.author: Patrick MacGill

data.quote: Because it's cheaper and easier to fly than ever before, air travel is becoming democratized.
data.author: Peter Diamandis

data.quote: If you travel in time and space, most of the people you know and love will eventually be gone. But you'll also be able to go and find them again.
data.author: Peter Capaldi

data.quote: To be able to travel the world, especially to places I never thought I'd be... it's really, you know, still fascinating for me.
data.author: Beyonce Knowles

data.quote: I travel without barely any luggage. Just a second set of underwear and binoculars and a map and a toothbrush.
data.author: Werner Herzog

data.quote: I love Ralph Lauren. As I travel so much, I prefer to shop online.
data.author: Meghan Markle

data.quote: We are not coaching on a daily basis because we often travel with our charity and commercial interests.
data.author: Nadia Comaneci

data.quote: When I travel, which is most of the year, I live in TripIt.
data.author: Matt Mullenweg

data.quote: Travel at least erodes some of the narrowness that exists in each of us.
data.author: Pete Hamill

data.quote: Every traveler knows too well the endless quest for the perfect travel bag: the one that's stylish enough to carry through Paris, sturdy enough to tote around Peru, and - most important - doesn't make your shoulder sag even before you've loaded it up with everything you need for a day of sightseeing.
data.author: Hanya Yanagihara

data.quote: I like to sit down, relax, have a cup of coffee on the terrace and read a book. I like to travel the world - and I'm lucky to see so much through cycling.
data.author: Marianne Vos

data.quote: Why, I'd like nothing better than to achieve some bold adventure, worthy of our trip.
data.author: Aristophanes

data.quote: I don't sleep very well when I travel. And as a result, I tend to be awake in cities when everyone else is asleep.

data.quote: While human space travel is daunting, machines - with their indefinitely long lifetimes - could travel the galaxy. It might make little difference to them that bridging the distance from one star to the next could take hundreds of thousands of years or more.
data.author: Seth Shostak

data.quote: A practical way to travel between the stars is a must-have for space opera, and a sine qua non for our frequently vaunted future as a galactic society.

data.quote: I would love to be a travel writer. I'd be so stoked.

data.quote: And it was a great experience, you know, to travel the world and compete at a certain level. It teaches you discipline, focus, and certainly keeps you out of trouble.

data.quote: I only travel with a carry-on suitcase in most instances.

data.quote: Science fiction is filled with Martians and space travel to other planets, and things like that.
data.author: Margaret Atwood

data.quote: I love to prune my roses. That's the one thing I really feel I do pretty well. Other things I usually, because I travel so much, leave to my gardeners who know what I love. data.quote: Actually, I had a lot of good people with me - my mother's sister did a lot of taking care of me, and I suppose I got more attention than my stepbrothers because at least I got to travel with my parents.

data.quote: Our deeds still travel with us from afar, and what we have been makes us what we are.

data.quote: There are some times when you make films and you travel places, and the take that people in the business have is that the worst way to see a city is to shoot there, because you work these long 12, 13 and 14-hour days, and you go home to the hotel, you eat, and you pass out.

data.quote: I just can't do heels any more. At least not when I'm working. I travel a lot.

data.quote: Technology doesn't address everything - for example, air travel still sucks.

data.quote: The job of the travel writer is to go far and wide, to make voluminous notes, to tell the truth.
data.author: Paul Theroux

data.author: Paul Theroux

data.author: Paul Theroux

data.author: Paul Theroux

data.author: Paul Theroux

data.quote: I wouldn't say that I'm a travel novelist, but rather a novelist who travels - and who uses travel as a background for finding stories of places.
data.author: Paul Theroux

data.author: Paul Theroux

data.quote: I always want off-the-beaten-path, Anthony Bourdain-inspired travel.

data.quote: Time travel and teleportation will have to wait. It may take centuries to master these technology. data.quote: Travel makes a wise man better, and a fool worse.

data.quote: With all the travel we're doing to cold-weather cities, your mind definitely starts to wander. It gets you away from the game. Even when you arrive in a city, you're tempted to just sit in your hotel and rest. Sometimes it's nice to just get out and walk around, to see what's there.

data.quote: I hope to play until I'm, like, 38 or something, and that's a lot of years in the game and a lot of travel and a lot of sacrifice on my family's part.

data.quote: When you travel so many weeks a year, it's always nice to have a home-cooked meal.

data.quote: When I travel, I love speaking to women around the world about the things that inspire them, the fashions they like, what makes something good and what would make it even better.

data.quote: For years, I meant to read 'Arabian Sands', Wilfred Thesiger's account of two punishing camel journeys during the late 1940s across Southern Arabia's Empty Quarter. data.quote: Snowboarding's tough, because you've got to go to the mountains. For me, I love the skateboard season because I get to hangout at home and still be skating. I don't have to travel to Norway or Japan or these crazy places to be snowboarding.

data.quote: No veteran or active duty service member should endure a long hospital stay alone. Yet sadly, due to the high cost of travel, all too often our military families are separated while America's heroes receive care. Sometimes families sleep in hospital parking lots, unable to afford long stays in a hotel.

data.quote: I love to travel. This is the time for me. When will I do it if not now?

data.quote: I travel all the time. And as I go around the world, I try to learn a little something and not just take up all the available air.

data.quote: We travel a lot and don't get enough time to spend with our family, and so we have to take our pictures, videos, also bother about things like which are the HD quality phones. So I'm very much a part of these typical things.

data.quote: After you pay your E-ZPass bill, there is no reason for the government to keep records of your travel.

data.quote: It's sometimes tiring to get off a long-haul flight and go straight to the studio for a shoot, but if you really plan everything well, you can get so much out of combining travel with work.

data.quote: The beauty of reading is that it lets you travel in a way you could never know.
data.author: Alek Wek

data.quote: I really enjoy what I do, and who I'm with and where I am. Having said that, I'm not really a person of habit, because what I do in my job is travel around the world and play concerts to people, and occasionally do very weird things.

data.quote: No one working as an astronomer is shackled in chains. This is a tremendous profession. There are lots of neat people, and you get to do cool things. data.quote: I have no idea what it would be like to be just one thing and speak one language. I feel enormously privileged to travel and be able to mingle and speak to people that, had I only known English, I wouldn't have been able to meet.

data.quote: We travel so much as touring musicians and artists that sometimes, when you hear a great song that you really think could be on your project, you go ahead and record it instead of try to write it.
